metadata.Title: CVE-2020-26088 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A missing CAP_NET_RAW check in NFC socket creation in net/nfc/rawsock.c inthe Linux kernel before 5.8.2 could be used by local attackers to createraw sockets, bypassing security mechanisms, aka CID-26896f01467a.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
